waivers_readme.description: Waiver records (WVR-####). Used to temporarily allow exceptions to gates/policies with explicit scope, rationale, signoff, expiration, and evidence.
authoring_rules: Waivers MUST be scoped (gate_ids, requirement_ids, quality_dimension_ids) to avoid blanket exceptions.
Waivers MUST include evidence_ids and a mitigation rationale.
Expired waivers MUST NOT be used.
